1.content: Rain clouds gathered overhead, which delighted Professor Benjamin Keller. He had been meticulously planning today's event for months. Rain meant a lessor crowd for the Avengers press conference, which was meant to celebrate the world premiere of the movie based on their exploits. It would be far easier for him to get into position to enact his plan. He chuckled out loud, laughing at the absurd simplicity of it. For the past 6 months he had pain-stakingly disassembled the gamma-siphoning gun from the government lab that he worked at. It was a weapon meant for the past, one where the Hulk was chased down as a fugitive by the Hulk-Busters. Now, the Hulk was a hero. Part of the most powerful collection of heroes ever assembled, The Avengers. He came across it quite innocently six months ago, and as he realized the weapon's implications, he formulated his most brilliant idea. No one at the lab knew who had created it, but as it sat unused for over a decade, it was seemingly forgotten about. He had approached the lab supervisor about studying it, with a fail-safe ruse in mind. He would attempt to reverse engineer it to siphon radiation sickness from victims of potential terrorist attacks. Piece by piece he had deconstructed it, and replaced the parts with plastic replicas. Sometimes he would allow weeks to go by without ever going near it, even though it consumed his every thought. He didn't want anyone to suspect what he was doing. But now the day was finally here. He knew that this event had been planned for months, and it was the perfect opportunity to get near the Hulk. The gun's beam would seek out the source of the gamma radiation, so the Professor could be at a safe enough distance to not get caught. Once he had the gamma radiation stored within his gun, all it would take is the flip of a switch to reverse it's beam to him, and he would become the most powerful man on the planet. He looked over his thin, frail frame, and smiled. Soon, he would not only be brilliant, but his body would finally match, no, it would exceed his mental capabilities.
1.title: Professor Keller's plan

choices: The Hulk feels strange... suddenly his powers begin to ebb.
The Vision detects Keller's device, and makes a beeline for it
Kate is suspicious of Benjamin, and demands answers
11.content:
Keller's plan was intricate, and it would have to be carried out with pinpoint accuracy. Early on the day of the press conference, he had booked a room in the Holiday Inn that stood directly overlooking the podium. Keller had had to spend a few extra weeks building a telescopic sight onto the gamma gun so that he could position the beam with total accuracy, and also some time trying to find which hotel room was best placed to shoot the siphoning beam from. Now though, everything was in readiness.

There was risk involved in this venture, of course. The beam had to be invisible, and at a low frequency-- anything higher and the Avengers highly sensitive recording devices would pick up the electromagnetic emanations of the device. Subjecting the Hulk to a full blast on the beam's highest frequency would be a bad move-- both the Hulk and the Avengers would respond swiftly and mercilessly to such a brazen attack long before the beam had collected enough gamma energy. The only option was to have the device drain Dr Banner's power slowly over the course of the press conference. With any luck the big green brute would just think he was feeling unwell, and subcomb to the effects of the siphoning device in good time. There was always a danger that the Hulk could move away before the beam had finished it's work, however-- but it was a gamble Keller just had to take. There would be no other opportunity to get close to the Hulk, and this was his best hope. Wiping his sweating palms on his hands, he peered down the gunsights and watched the gathering crowds, waiting for the arrival of his quarry.

After about fifteen minutes delay (which made Keller nervous-- had he been detected and the copnverence called off? Would he shortly be interrupted by the sound of Captain America pummelling his hotel room door open?)-- they came. Warbird came first, floating down from an uncomfortably close distance to Keller, who froze as she drifted past. Her arms were outstretched and one muscular leg was bent forward at the knee, like a balet dancer performing Swan Lake. Her back was to Keller, so she couldn't have noticed the barrel of his Gamma-Siphoner, covered as it was by a dark cloth and aimed from well within the hotel room. She landed on the podium to great applause, and raised her arms in greeting to the fans. Next was Justice and Firestar-- the flame-haired woman streaking down from the sky like a falling meteor, a firey trail behind her. She came down at such speed that many of the crowd made an uneasy sound, but soon broke out into rapturous applause when Firestar came to a halt just above the podium and turned off her fire aura, landing as gracefully as a cat on the stage. Justice followed behind, encased in a glowing bubble of powerful psychic energy, his hair and cape floating dreamily in it's weightless embrace. He came to land beside his girlfriend Firestar, and raised a fist in salute to the crowd whilst placing the other arm around Firestar's slender waist. The Bombastic Beast was next, and as the furry blue mutant tumbled down from the roof of a coffee bar and leapt onto the stage, Keller frowned. Where was the Hulk? Had he pulled out at the last minute? Keller looked nervously behind him, expecting the door to come crashing down at any second. Keller returned his gaze to the stage and watched the next Avenger ariving. A ghostly outline of a cape wearing man suddenly appeared suspended over the heads of the other Avengers. Complex circuitry became visible, then organic looking but entirely synthetic muscle tissue. A yellow, green and red epidermis solidified to reveal the unmistakable form of the Vision. Keller cursed his luck-- the Vision might be able to detect his beam, even at this low frequency. This didn't bode well. His despair at this turn of events melted away quickly as he felt a slight tremor pass through the room. Looking down onto an empty patch of the square behind the crowd, Keller grinned as he saw the Hulk dressed in nothing but a pair of knee-length purple trunks. Keller clasped his gamma-siphoning gun eagerly, waiting for the Hulk to make his way to the podium. Instead though, the Hulk knealt, and the crowd parted before him. Frowning at the oddity of this, the sound of a motorbike filled the air, and then suddenly a shape lifted off from the Hulk's powerful back. It was Captain America on a motorbike! The jump took him high into the air, and with an astonishing speed and nimbleness that belied his imposing bulk, the Hulk sped forward to the stage and waited as Cap's bike descended. Effortlessly, the green goliath caught both the bike and it's rider, and Captain America somersaulted from his ride and onto the podium. The crowd went wild, and even Keller had to shake his head in astonishment at this.
Captain America waved for silence, and began to speak.
"Friends," he began, the sound of his voice reducing all to an awed hush, "We're here today to celebrate not just a movie, but to honour those people without whom none of us would be standing here today--you."
Thunderous applause. The Hulk had taken his place beside Captain America. It was time.

Keller finished aiming the weapon from the back of of his hotel room and out the open window. He flicked off the safety catch, and with a trembling finger, fired the device. An invisible stream of gamma-absorbing particles streaked down towards the stage and hit the Hulk square in his back. He peered back through the infra-red telescopic sights, which showed the beam as an etherial glowing strand which arced downward, and grinned. Success! The readings from his device were telling him that Dr Banner's gamma energy was slowly but surely being siphoned, but Banner himself did not appear to notice what was happening to him at all. The Vision too remained impassive as Captain America continued his speech. Rubbing his hands together with glee, Doctor Benjamin Keller grabbed his suit jacket and made his way out of the hotel room. He would now make his way down to the crowds gathered outside, and once there meet his wife, Kate.


Kate Keller had idolised the Avengers since their initial battle with the Hulk and Loki, many years ago. Her workplace was close by, so she was able to attend the press launch for the Avengers movie during her lunch break. It was also affording her the opportunity to spend a little time with her husband Ben, who had been very absorbed in his work of late. He'd never really shared Kate's interest in the Avengers, but for some reason had insisted on making this press conference a date. She watched him approach now, looking happier than he had done in months. Kissing her on the cheek, Ben took his side at his wife's place.
"Well, look at you so happy all of a sudden!" Kate laughed.
"This is going to be a momentous occaision, Kate. I can feel it..."

12.content:
The Professor loaded the gun into the trunk of his car, slammed it shut and began walking towards his house. His wife Elizabeth was running late, and if she didn't get here soon he would have to leave without her. He didn't want to, he really wanted her to witness his moment of triumph first-hand, but he couldn't wait much longer.

As he got to the front door, his wife came racing up the driveway in their other car, and who she had inside with her infuriated Ben. He saw both his mother in-law and sister in-law, and both of them got on his nerves equally. His mother in-law, Joyce, she of the 3 failed marriages, was always instructing Elizabeth on ways Ben could be a better husband. He had a million ways that she could be a better mother in-law, but he kept them to himself. His sister in-law, Jackie, was so snobby that he was surprised to even see her sitting in the back-seat of their SUV. She was used to driving around in her BMW, as her husband's very succesful investment firm afforded them an incredibly priveleged lifestyle.

"Liz, what the hell are you thinking? I don't have time for this right now!" He yelled at her like she was a 10 year old.

"I would never allow my husband to speak to me in such a disrespectful manner." Joyce interjected.

Elizabeth sighed, she knew this wasn't the best idea, but her sister and mother both wanted to come to the Avenger's mansion, in fact they had insisted on it, but she had hoped it wouldn't be such a big deal to Ben. "Ben honey, they wanted to come, I hope you don't mind. It would mean a lot to me if you let them come."
She looked at him with her sweet face, it was the look that both she and Ben knew that he couldn't resist. She only used it when it meant a lot to her to get her way.

"It's your car also Elizabeth, so you have a say in this."

"Jackie please, not now!" Elizabeth turned back towards her husband and saw his annoyance with this unforseen intrusion. But she also saw the look of compassion for her knowing that she was in an uncomfortable situation herself.

"Alright, Dweedle-Dee and Dweedle-Dum can come." Besides, he thought to himself, he couldn't wait to see the look on both of their faces when he got the Hulk's powers and transformed right in front of their smug faces. "We'll take this car, just let me grab something." Elizabeth smiled. It was going to turn out okay after all.

Ben opened the trunk back up and grabbed the case that was holding the precious cargo. He looked at it again and smiled. He looked over at his other car, Elizabeth had slid over to the passenger seat and she was engaged in a heated discussion with her mother and sister. How the hell did she turn out so sweet when the other 2 were such pain the asses. He slammed the trunk closed, pressed the remote to open the hatch on the back of the Tahoe, and he carefully placed the case in the rear. He hurridly walked over to the front of the SUV and hopped in.

"What was in the case honey?"
"Oh, just a special camera that I borrowed from work."

"It figures that he has to borrow a camera and doesn't have one of his own." Jackie remarked, which drew a chuckle from Joyce. Elizabeth reached over and placed her hand on top of his, letting him know whose side she was on.

Ben adjusted the rear-view mirror, pausing to look at the two hyenas yucking it up in the back at his expense. Soon, he would be the one laughing at them. He put the car in reverse, backed out of the driveway, and he was on his way to a date with destiny.

121.content:
Ben drove the car to the conference and he kept looking in the back of the rear view mirror fuming at his female in-laws. Finally they arrived in the hotel parking lot and Ben checked in to a 3rd story hotel room that had a large outdoor patio overlooking the press conference. The view of the conference was amazing and even better then if they would have had front row seats. Ben could hear his in-laws mocking him him for not getting tickets up close but he was to busy setting up his camera to mind. As soon as the Hulk got on stage Been hit the siphon button and watched as the Hills power levels slowly we're siphoned to his machine. As the transfer completed 100% the Hulk gave way to Bruce Banner who collapsed on press conference stage.

Jackie who had been watching this jumped up and shouted "what is wrong with the Hulk?" As she did she knocked over the camera which came to a crash on the wood patio. As it bounced around for a few seconds Been watched with first relief as the machine showed 100% of the Hulks strength was still inside and then as it landed on its side it then showed 0% as the beam fired. Ben looked at the direction of of the beam and saw his wife walking towards him. She had just used the restroom.

Then it happened. The power of the hulk erupted ripping Elizabeth's clothes off as her body ballooned to the size of the hulk. Ben had to admit she looked hot but as he looked at his nude and insanely muscular wife he saw what was supposed to his muscles. Elizabeth finally said "Ben what happened?"

Finally Ben broke down and told the truth and Elizabeth laughed as been, her sister, and mom all watched the muscle woman flex her new body. "Well Ben I like my anniversary present."

122.content:
Ben tried to drive as fast as possible, but not so fast as to get pulled over. Elizabeth noticed he was driving much more aggresively than normal, "Are you racing someone honey?"

He smiled at her, "No, no. I'm just trying to get out of the car as quick as possible. I'm getting tired of hearing about all of my faults from those two in the backseat."

"I could go on and on Benjamin."

"Mother! Could you try and be civil. Ben was nice enough to drive you in with us so you could get a firsthand look at the Hulk and the rest of the Avengers, it's the least you can do to be polite to him."

Joyce blushed, she had long had a fascination with the Hulk and his overwhelmingly muscular and powerful physique. Her attraction to powerful men had landed her 3 wealthy husbands, but unfortunately none of them had the physique that she preferred. In fact all of them were in rather poor shape, but they made up for it in their bank accounts.
"I just want to get a close-up look for myself of the most spectacular male specimen on earth."

"Oh Mom, doesn't the green skin bother you at all?"

"Liz, your mother loves green. It's the color of money." Ben chuckled at his own dig.

Jackie came to her mother's defense, "Don't pay attention to him mother. Benny just has size envy." Both she and her mother laughed again at Ben's expense. Not for much longer, Ben thought to himself.

"Joyce, what would you do if the Hulk actually liked you, imagine that for a second. He just might like 52 year old divorcees with fake boobs, a face full of botox, and hair with streaks of grey in it. I mean, I know you're a maneater, but I don't think you'd be able to handle him."

"Enough children, we've arrived." Elizabeth cut him off, happy that they were there before their bickering escalated any further.

Ben hopped out of the car so fast, he felt like a kid on Christmas morning racing to get in front of the Christmas tree. He went around to the back of the SUV and got the case out. "You guys go ahead, I'm going to wait back here to get a few shots. I'll catch up with you in a few minutes."

Joyce and Jackie made their way to the security checkpoint up ahead, but Elizabeth stayed back with Ben. "I'll wait for you honey. Let them go up to see them by themselves." Elizabeth wrapped her arms around his chest from behind, cradled up against him.

"Alright, that sounds like a good idea."

Ben engaged his wife with small talk as he waited for his in-laws to make their way through the security, and the long line that had formed to go and meet the Avengers. He saw them approaching the stage, it looked like a graduation ceremony as the attendees would walk up the small stairs on the righthand side and walk across the stage, passing each member of the Avengers along they way as they exited to the left. "Liz, look. Your mom and sister are almost there."

Elizabeth grabbed the binoculars that Ben had been looking through. As she was distraced, Ben opened the case with the gamma-siphoning device.

As Joyce approached the stage, her heart fluttered as she saw the Hulk standing there. He dwarfed everyone else on stage, including Thor. She was surprised just how large he was, as sheer power literally just poured through his physique. As she walked past the other Avengers in almost a trance-like state she approached the Hulk. She barely came up to the top of his abdomen, when suddenly a beam of light came out of nowhere and struck the Hulk. Instantly, his immense muscles shrank away to nothing as he withered down to a frail-looking husk of a man. Joyce looked at him with disgust, she couldn't believe that this was what the Hulk looked like in his normal state.

Panic ensued immediately as each Avenger went on alert to see if they were the next to be attacked. Ironman took to the air and flew over the crowd to get a better view, looking for the source of the beam that had powered down the Hulk.

Ben couldn't believe it worked so well. The look of horror on his mother in-laws face was priceless, but it would be nothing compared to what would happen next. He quickly reversed the gun's settings, readying himself for the influx of power, when suddenly Elizabeth turned towards him, scared by what had just happened on stage. She rushed towrds Ben causing him to accidentily fire the gun. The beam shot back in the direction of it's initial source, but instead of striking Bruce Banner, it hit Joyce as she stood in front of him.

Ben's heart almost burst through his chest as he realized that the beam went back to it's original power source. He had been so close.
Ironman saw the beam fire out again towards the stage and immediately fired at the source. He swooped down and grabbed the person that had fired the gun, thankfully it was in pieces by his feet so it would no longer be able to harm anyone else. Ben felt himself being pulled up by his armpits and was being flown towards the stage. The security had cleared the front of the stage, but Joyce, Jackie, and a few others that had been on the stage remained. The Avengers were huddled around Bruce Banner to make sure he was alright. "I'm fine, I'm fine he reassured them."

Joyce and Jackie didn't know what to do as there was chaos all around them.. Jackie looked up as she heard Ironamn approach the stage, "Look mother!"

They both looked up to see Ironman land while he was carrying Ben. Joyce and Jackie were confused. Everyone seemed to be confused.

"I saw this guy fire the gun that did this to the Hulk. Luckily, I destroyed it before he could use it again."

Ben felt helpless as the Avengers circled him, he noticed a look of glee on his inlaw's faces. "I was so close...so close to getting his powers."

Captain America approached Ben, "what are you talking about?" Ben looked up at him, he figured that nothing other than the truth would suffice.

"I had stolen a gamma-siphoning device from the lab that I work at. I wanted to take the Hulk's powers for myself. And I was so close, but before I could shoot myself with it, I misfired and it shot back out again and hit Dr. Banner. Everyone looked over at Bruce, relieved at how close it had come to someone else becoming the most powerful force on Earth. It had taken years before Bruce had gotten the Hulk under control, where he was able to maintain his own mind when he transformed. "There's only one problem guys. The beam didn't strike me again."

Thor looked around puzzled, "But if the power did not return to you, where did it go?"

Joyce smiled as she heard this. She couldn't believe her good fortune. It was almost too good to be true. Not only did she get hit with the beam, it was because of her insipid son in-law's mistake that she got it instead of him. "I know who got hit with it," she paused as everyone turned to look at her, including Ben, "Me."

Ben began to sweat profusely as his legs went out from underneath him.. He collapsed onstage as his worst fears began magnified. "NO! NO!"

Jackie looked over at her mother worriedly, "Mother, are you alright? How do you feel?"

Joyce's heart began racing with excitement, "Let's find out."

1221.content:
The Avengers circled around Joyce. She noticed that they all had a rather uncomfortable look on each one of their faces, as if they were unsure on exactly what they should do with her. This made her feel quite important, that their discomfort centered on her. As Thor drew closer to her and stopped only a few feet away from her, she realized that he was an extremely imposing man. Maybe not as large as the Hulk was, but far bigger than anyone else she had ever been near. One by one the rest of the Avengers surrounded her, and this began to irritate her.

"I don't know why you are all looking at me like I'VE done something wrong here, I was just here to meet all of you when my idiotic son-in-law pulled his boneheaded stunt." She motioned towards Ben, who was slumped over on the ground, looking utterly defeated. She looked up at each of The Avengers, and smirked, "You all think that you're so high and mighty. That you can try to intimidate a helpless middle-aged woman? Well, I've got some news for you, it's not going to work."

With that Joyce took a deep breath and began to concentrate. She felt the gamma-fueled power welling up inside her like a volcano ready to explode. Mount Joyce was ready to be unleashed! Her eyes turned green as the transformation began. She felt her muscles inflating outward, surging larger and larger with rediculous ease.

"This feeeeels woooonderful...." She said to noone imparticular, but she knew that it had to be killing Ben. Seeing HER get the Hulk's powers, of all people her, had to make him feel horrible.

The Avengers slowly backed away from her, giving her space to grow. Her muscles were beginning to tear through her clothing, her thighs pulled her dress to the breaking point as the material stood no chance against them. Huge green quads poured through, as the remnants of the dress crept up higher and higher. Her blouse was pulled tight against her growing upper body as it too exploded apart exposing huge muscles all over, and gigantic breasts that jutted out impossibly. She was looking down at all of them now, including Thor. This began to arouse her, and her nipples sprang forth proving that. Captain America looked at her, his mouth wide-open from the shock of seeing a once frail, older woman transform into the giganticly muscled specimen in front of him.

"What's the matter Cap" she cupped her huge breasts in front of his face, "Have you never seen tits this big before?" She chuckled as she saw his reaction. He stumbled backwards like he was trying to avoid getting stung by a bee.

She began to twirl her long, thick, dark green hair between her fingers. Everything about this felt amazing. She looked down at her body. It was hard to believe that this was her body now. Muscles this size that just moments ago were on the Hulk, now covered her body from head to toe. There would be no more marrying men for their money. Now, she had the power to take whatever she wanted to, and no one could stop her.

Thor approached the newly-transformed Joyce. He couldn't believe the size of the woman.
"Miss, you're going to have to come with us back to Avengers mansion. We have quite a bit to discuss with you."

He casually placed his hand on her immense arm, just to sort of guide her off the stage. Joyce took this the wrong way and instinctively flung her elbow back at him. Thor went flying back as if a bomb exploded, and a smile spread across Joyce's face as she realized what she had just done. She had just sent a god flying twenty feet, with a slight bump of her elbow. If she had any question to how strong she was, it was immediately answered. She WAS the most powerful person on earth, and heaven help anyone that got in her way!

12212.content:
The rest of the Avengers backed away for her, not sure of what to expect from her next. She had just tossed Thor aside like a rag-doll and he was their most powerful remaining member. She smiled as she saw the fear and uneasiness in their faces, but the Avengers didn't matter to her right now. Joyce looked down at Ben, way down at him in fact as he had slumped over in defeat, sitting on the stage with his head down. He looked like a child compared to her, and the fact that his mistake was the reason that this fortuitous turn of events took place made it even sweeter. She walked over towards him, and stood in front of him, each of her feet appeared to be the size of his torso.

"Don't worry Avengers, I'm not going to hurt anyone, I just need to speak to my son-in-law." She chuckled as she said it, knowing it was the last thing that he wanted to do.

"Ohhh Benjamin....don't be so upset. Your plan was a success, you took away the Hulk's powers!" She brought up her arm and flexed it, the muscles erupting forth, delighting her even more.

"Look how big it is, why I think it's the biggest muscle that I have ever seen. What do you think Benjamin, is it the biggest arm that you've ever seen?" He didn't want to look, he couldn't look. His moment of triumph, his moment of redemption, was destroyed. If it had to be anyone else, why did it have to be his annoying, condescending mother-in-law. Anyone else would have been better, even his sister-in-law Jackie would have been better than Joyce.

Joyce extended her huge green foot towards his face, and put it under his chin, "Benjamin, you will look at me when I address you", and lifted his face up so he would be looking up at her.

"I just wanted you to see what you have done. Thanks to you, I have the Hulk's powers, and there's not a damn thing you, or anyone can do about it. One of my feet has more power in it than your entire body. Try and move it, please, I'm begging you. Try to move it an inch."

Elizabeth had enough, this was a total disaster for many reasons, but she wouldn't have her husband humiliated any further. She stood up to confront her, barely coming up to her muscle-plated stomach. She couldn't believe how big her mother was. The overall thickness of her muscles was astounding. If it wasn't her mother's face looking down at her, she wouldn't have believed it was her. "Mom leave him alone. Isn't it enough that you've gotten the Hulk's powers instead of Ben."

Joyce smiled at her daughter, she was proud of her for coming to her husband's defense. It was foolish and a waste of time, but she was proud none the less. "Elizabeth, I just wanted to give him an up-close view of what he has created. His incompetence has really come back to bite him in the ass this time, but I'm eternally grateful. He's given me more than I could have possibly imagined I would ever get from him, but you really need to stay out of this, as Benjamin and I need to share this special moment."

Joyce took her foot out from under his chin and placed it on the ground in front of him. She rotated her calf muscle towards him and flexed it. It was easily bigger than his entire head.
"Feel my calf muscle. Go ahead and try and wrap your hands around it." Benjamin just stared up at her. "I said, wrap your hands around my calf. Do it. Now"

Ben reached out in front of him and slowly placed his hands around his mother-in-laws now enormous calf muscle. It felt like a bowling ball covered in flesh. His left hand touched the front portion of her shin and his right hand touched the inner portion of her calf muscle. "How big do you think they are?"

He tried to touch his thumbs together, but they couldn't reach and cover just the front portion of her calf. All he kept thinking about was that this power, these muscles, should have been his. He lost himself in his thoughts but found that he couldn't help but run his hands around the entire calf, as he was mesmerized by their sheer size.

"Why Benjamin, are you feeling me up? Ohhh Elizabeth, I would watch him if I were you. He can't keep his hands off of me." Elizabeth looked at Ben as he was wrapping his hands around her mother's calf muscle. She could swear by the look in his eyes that he was actually enjoying it. She didn't know if she should be jealous or disgusted by it.

He quickly came to his senses as he realized what he was doing, and quickly pulled his hands away. Joyce smirked, knowing that she had won another round.
"Well Benjamin, that will be enough of that. It will be the last time you get to feel my muscles. Besides, I have bigger fish to to fry now. After all, you've given me everything you have to offer."

She stepped away from them and looked around, everyone was unsure of what she would do next. A thought came to her. She had seen on TV that the Hulk able to jump miles at a time, so she decided it was time for her to try out her new method of transportation, her own newly empowered leg muscles.

"Take care everyone, I'm off to see an old friend." She crouched down, the quadricep muscles bunching together, and then she shot up in the air like a cannonball, off to pay someone a visit.

1242.content:
Tabitha had been uncomfortable in her clothes all day.

The beautiful, ultra-buxom 30-year old teacher was looking down at the shelf of her chest, white fabric of a "conservative" blouse stretched egregiously over her 52-inch balloons, the many darts and extra stitching all tensing nearly to bursting around her heavy breasts.

She was looking down at a golden chain. Its little heart locket had fallen into one of the gaps separated between her buttons by her overabundant cleavage, poofing and popping up regularly as she breathed and shifted in her uncomfortable clothes, filled to the max with her ripe brown flesh.

She looked positively indecent, she thought. "But what are my alternatives except for looking like a bag lady."

She sighed, sealing the lockets fate as she tried to pull her royal-purple powersuit away from her waist, in order to de-emphasize the contrast between it's waspish dimensions and her phenomenally overdeveloped shelf of a chest.

"Those boys and their superheroes." She thought. "It's so American. I just don't get it." But she was glad for the fact that every other male eye wasn't popping her way every five seconds.

Unobserved, she indulged in a little pride, wrapping her slim fingers almost all the way around her waist. "Still in my twenties." she thought, with a little smirk. The position thrust out her chest and made her boobs wobble. She felt herself bounce in her seat a bit on her super-pneumatic ass.

The avengers circled her, some keeping an eye on her, while others kept their eyes on the direction of the beam. The Vision kept crying out for Wanda. The beam slowly changed from a green color to a white color, then it stopped. She fell straight to the ground, but the Vision caught her before the fall could cause her to be hurt.

Her red tiara/crown fell off of her red hair, letting it flow freely. She was fast asleep as the Vision kept trying to call for her. But then, there was a ping on technology based superheroes like the Vision and Iron Man as there is a ping on Wanda’s life. There is a rise of gamma radiation in her system. She woke up screaming, with her eyes completely green. Her skin started to take a hint of green and her clothing had started to stretch. She started to look like...
